title: Desmond O'Donnell
text: Desmond Hillary O'Donnell (7 October 1921 – 18 January 1992) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Prop">prop</a>, O'Donnell represented <a href="Wellington%20Rugby%20Football%20Union">Wellington</a> at a provincial level from 1945 to 1951. He played for the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, in one match, the second test against the <a href="1949%20Australia%20rugby%20union%20tour%20of%20New%20Zealand">touring Australian team</a> in 1949.
